entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
